description: Things you'll feel if your relationship is working!
title: What is good love?
content:
In a good, loving relationship you will notice these things: 

+ You have strong caring feelings as well as physical attraction for your boyfriend or girlfriend, and you would easily agree that the word to describe this is “love”. 
+ You know that your boyfriend or girlfriend loves you because they have said “I love you” back.  
+ Your boyfriend or girlfriend makes you feel special and good about yourself.
+ You trust them not to betray you or hurt your relationship. You feel safe.
+ When you fight or argue, you resolve the argument without getting angry or hurting each other. 
+ Your boyfriend or girlfriend never asks you to choose between him/her and your loyalties to your family and friends.
+ Neither of you feels the need to test each other's loyalties or feelings.
+ If sex is part of your relationship, it is because you both want it and agree to it without pressure. 
+ When you have sex, you both enjoy it and it increases the feeling of emotional closeness and love between you. 

**It may take a few relationships before you find one that is working, healthy and happy. You may have to learn what to look out for in a boyfriend or girlfriend, and what you like and don’t like. But it is worth waiting for a relationship that is based on love, respect and mutual protection.**
